I haven't actually played this since 2017, but I was reminded about it and just want to say, this game would be great if only one killer had the spider god sacrificing mechanic. The fact that none of the killers actually kill is insanely dumb, especially after all the dlc. If they made it so killers actually kill, I would drop everything and buy every third party IP DLC and play the hell out of this game. I played Last Year probably less than this game but wow was it so much better.

It sucks. No one is a killer, they are just cultists to some spider. I have no clue why leatherface, pinhead, pyramid head, sadako, and all the rest have stopped killing people so they can put people on meathooks for a spider, but it sure doesn't feel like playing a horror slasher.

well... how do i start
Short answer for the people who dont care, game is bad, community is divided and garage (and no, not in the funny toxic trash talker way, more like starting a political debate on twitter or Reddit kinda way) they dont care about you they only care about your money and nothing else.

now im about to go on a rant.
the game had a lot of legs to stand on when it came out, but slowly it kept losing all of them one by one, and i cant fucking stand it anymore, 

first the gameplay
to me what made the game fun is that you can do what ever you want and use what ever, and as long as your good you can always win with what ever, every match was different from the others cuz you got to see new killers using new builds and the same thing goes to the survivors, you got perks, add ons, items and a lot of crazy plays from both sides, which was awesome cuz ive never see a game like dbd where the fun is being carried by the gameplay, a lot of these slasher 4v1 games always get carried by the interaction between the killer and the survivors, but no not this game cuz it doesn't have ingame voice chat, so its crazy to me that a game like dbd survived by only its gameplay

so....what happened?
well we can blame both the community and the devs, the game use to be a fun party game, now its just a comp game and the goal is to try and finish the game as fast as possible, the survivors have A LOT OF PERKS like im not gonna be surprised if they had over 60 or 40 perks, yet they only use like 6 to 7 of them, im not gonna go into detail on which perks im talking about, but if you played this game or watched a streamer play this game, ya know which perks im talking about
what about killers? well same thing but because every killer is different, they have their own meta of 4 to 6 perks, same thing with add ons they well only use the BEST ONES never the ones that change the way to play the killer NO only the ones that increase your powers effectiveness, that is slowly getting fixed but ITS SOOOO FUCKING SLOW.
so no more unique games thanks to the devs not having a clear idea of which direction the game should go
amd the community for turning this game into a comp game rather then a FUN party game
OH WOW you just finished all gens in 5 mins with only one person hooked cuz you chose the best map and used the most effective perks, SOOO COOOOL
OH you camped the first guy until he died then did the same thing to the other person to secure the second kill!!!
or use the best killer in the game with the best perks and the best add ons

if you aren't already in the games system, i wouldn't recommend it. lots of bugs and exploits, stale meta, and the player base is either nice (sometimes) or toxic (often). unfortunately this is one of the better 4v1 games, but i wish it wasn't. i also wish they didn't have so many prominent horror licenses in their belt and the fact they lost stranger things means that at any time some people will just no longer be able to access content that is in the game.

i like this game, i'm a killer main and it's fun being able to have fun with survivors, but there are so so many variables that make that 1 good game hard to get to.
